steps.conclusion: None. All titles are in Portuguese, single-topic, <=5 words, without level/joiner words, and include valid english_title translations. is_language_course is correctly false for all. Icons have the required tabler- prefix.

Slight deviation from the guideline for vague inputs: the set leans heavily toward specific technologies (Python, Java, JavaScript, Android) and includes only one broad canonical option. Including more broad canonical courses like "Programação" or "Ciência da Computação" would better match expectations for a vague intent like "I want to code".

Add broader canonical suggestions such as "Programação", "Ciência da Computação" or "Engenharia de Software" to balance the list. Optionally replace one or two language-specific items with these broader options while keeping the rest as is. Everything else (titles, english_title, icon prefix, is_language_course) is already correct.
